title: The Final Days
revealed_to_reader: Aria: 2 days sedated, 1 day conscious (ratio shifting toward unconsciousness)
Marcus preparing final contingencies if programming wins completely
Three-way choice stable: 45M digital, 6.5B physical-backup, 400M considering lock
Tanaka: Lock wouldn't save Aria (she's already constructed)
ONE PLAN LEFT: Become the quantum lock herself
Tanaka explained: Lock needs consciousness as anchor
Transformation destroys physical programming - Aria would be free
Eternal isolation but free from programming forever
Aria chose: Will become the lock/barrier/guardian

planted.element: Aria decided to become the lock

continuity: Days 70-85, Aria deteriorating rapidly, decision to sacrifice herself as lock made, leads to Ch17
